conversation.message_text: Dr. Westin Childs: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Dr. Westin Childs.
Dr. Westin Childs: Welcome to Dr. Westin Childs! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Dr. Westin Childs: Welcome! Click here to for your 20% off coupon: https://drwc.attn.tv/aeKdEzeboins
You did not apply my 20% discount to   the order, and there was no space to enter the code at checkout.  I do not understand.

Dr. Westin Childs: I apologize for the confusion this has caused. The promo code field is available at checkout-you'll just need to click on "Have a coupon? Click here to enter your code," and the box will appear.

I don't see any orders placed on my end yet. To confirm, have you already completed the order, or are you still in the process of checking out? Let me know so I can guide you further.
I finished my order and got a confirmation thank you for your order with no discount.

Dr. Westin Childs: I'm sorry to hear that. We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to hello@restartmed.com or feel free to call this number (480) 331-9431. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!
My receipt # is 370030 at 3:47 PM for $46.75 and there should be $9.35 discount.

Dr. Westin Childs: Thanks for letting me know. However, we don't handle post-purchase requests via text. I truly wish I could fix this directly for you, but my system can only handle product-related concerns. Thank you for your utmost patience and understanding.

send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_donts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
tone: Don't use the term "hang tight", just say that you've passed the information to the team
Close the conversation once the client takes over
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM
